normalized: about two weeks later.
the same tatsurou that has all but vanished from yukikaze's mind――
the special camp is still going on.
under the guidance of sakura-sensei and murasaki-sensei,i am now training in more advanced techniques.
even though a day doesn't go by without me worryingabout yukikaze and rinko-ane, right now this is all i can do.
and one day during my practice――
sakura-sensei ordered me to report to asagi-sensei.
full of apprehension, i nonetheless obeyed.
i spot some unfamiliar faces at school.
stout men wearing black suits.
somehow i'm willing to bet that they aren't from around here.
there's about ten of them, assembled in the hallway.
they're doing a good job of ignoringthe suspicious glares from the students,like men used to guarding something…or someone.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （what are those guys doing here?
i arrive in front of asagi-sensei's door,my sense of foreboding steadily escalating.

name: tatsurou
normalized: it's akiyama tatsurou.
i was told to come here.

name: asagi
normalized: come in.

name: tatsurou
normalized: excuse me.

name: man
normalized: so you're akiyama-kun?
i'm barely inside the room when the mannext to asagi-sensei begins to talk to me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （eh?
that man…?
i've seen that face before.

name: yazaki
normalized: pleased to meet you!
i'm counting on you!
his tone suspiciously presumptuous,the man extends his hand towards me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: p-plea-pleased to meet you…i-i'm akiyama tatsurou.
for good manners' sake, i shake it.
the greasy palm of a middle-aged man.

name: asagi
normalized: akiyama, this is the secretary general of the government party,yazaki muneichi.

name: yazaki
normalized: so i am.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （yazaki?
that yazaki…?
no wonder i remember the face.
it's the politician yukikaze and rinko-ane knocked aroundwhen we infiltrated that skyscraper four months ago.
yukikaze got so angry at him she ended up kickinghis chin really hard… it should have leftserious injuries, but his chin is as good as new.
in any case, there's no doubt he's the same man that secretlyheld a meeting with demons in his luxurious penthouse.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （could it be that he forgot me?
it's not like i made a big impact back then…
is yazaki just pretending to not recognize me,or did he really forget?
i'm not sure.

name: asagi
normalized: akiyama, mister yazaki is adamant aboutinspecting our taimanin village.

name: tatsurou
normalized: inspecting?

name: asagi
normalized: indeed, that is what he's hoping for.

name: yazaki
normalized: exactly.
so, once again, i'm counting on you, akiyama-kun.

name: asagi
normalized: i was about to do the honors by myself, but then i thoughta student's point of view might be valuable as well.
so i called you.
asagi-sensei is perfectly calm and composed,but i can still feel her underlying animosity towards yazaki.
nothing surprising if he has demonic connections.
so, if i'm getting this right…
even though asagi-sensei knows full well the kind of scoundrel he is,this shameless bastard shows up with great pompat our hometown to put pressure on us.
and assigning me to escort him is part of sensei's counterattack.
i'm about to witness a showdown betweenthe strongest taimanin asagi, and the corrupt politician yazaki.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （i'm way out of my league…）
i'm really sorry asagi-sensei,but i'm too weak to be a part of this.
besides, why would i be picked for the task?
it's not like i'm of any use in this situation.
and that's how i ended up making the roundsof the campus' facilities, alongside asagi-sensei and yazaki.
i was uncomfortable the whole way, but since neitheryukikaze nor rinko-ane were available, i couldn't get out of it.
on the surface, asagi-sensei and yazaki's conversationis perfectly well-mannered.
however, you can easily spot the hidden daggers behind those smiles.
asagi-sensei's tongue in particular is as sharp as her sword.
i caught something like『taimanin always stand ready to eliminate corrupt politicians』.
to which yazaki replied something that amounts to『one word from me and the government will crush the lot of you flat』.
it goes without saying that i'm on asagi-sensei's side,but i'm not really confident in my ability to help her.
no, even though this might have been meant as an opportunityfor me to redeem myself after being useless in that important mission,how could i even hope to meet expectations in this setting?
at any rate, now that the tour is overwe returned to the room from before.

name: yazaki
normalized: asagi-kun, akiyama-kun, i am most grateful for your assistance.
the time we spent together was very valuable.
yazaki thanks us, his true feelings carefully buriedbeneath his satisfied expression.

name: asagi
normalized: we were happy to help.
asagi-sensei smiles in return,probably at the thought of slashing him open.

name: yazaki
normalized: by the way, hmm, what was her name again…oh yeah!
is there a student named yukikaze here?

name: asagi
normalized: she's out on a mission right now, are you acquainted with her?

name: yazaki
normalized: oh no, i just heard that she was famous in the world of darkness.
i would certainly have enjoyed meeting a taimanin of such caliber.
where was she sent?

name: asagi
normalized: i cannot answer that.
only my direct superiorand the prime minister are privy to such informations.

name: yazaki
normalized: oh, i see!
yazaki's reply sounds forced.
at that moment, a man who appears to be his secretary calls out to him.

name: secretary
normalized: sir, the schedule…

name: yazaki
normalized: indeed!
well, i must take my leave.
once again,thanks for the visit, both of you.
i'm in your debt.
he leaves, having kept his politician act up to the last second.

name: tatsurou
normalized: at last he's gone…haa.
left alone with asagi-sensei, i can finally let out a sigh of relief.
even though i did expect yukikaze to be brought up at some point…
when he called her name,i couldn't stop my heart from skipping a beat.
of course i made sure to hide my feelingswhile he was talking with asagi-sensei.
asagi-sensei glances at me, and her carefullycontrolled expression turns into a wry smile.

name: asagi
normalized: so even tatsurou can put on a poker face now.
the special camp seems to have borne fruit.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah, no, i still have a long way to go.
anyway, if this man recognized me, he certainly hid it well.

name: asagi
normalized: true.
what could he be plotting?
i had his aides watched, but several managed toshake off their tails before reappearing one hour later.

name: tatsurou
normalized: those black suits?
she simply nods.

name: asagi
normalized: if they're able to hide from us, you can bet they're not simple paper-pushers.
until we know what that bastard is scheming, vigilance is essential.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes, ma'am.
but why are you sharingsuch an important issue with me, asagi-sensei?
asagi-sensei's expression stiffens.

name: asagi
normalized: i have a request for you.
it's about yukikaze and rinko's mission.

name: tatsurou
normalized: asagi-sensei, could this mean…

name: asagi
normalized: yes, i want you to join the team.
of course this is an official mission.

name: tatsurou
normalized: really?!
i am so happy!

name: asagi
normalized: yes.
i want a first-hand report of their situation.

name: tatsurou
normalized: did something happen to them?!
her eyes find mine.

name: asagi
normalized: no, for now their infiltration is going well.
however, i have only the word of an exterior informant for it.

name: asagi
normalized: i want you to confirm their situation by yourself.
to be on the safe side.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i'll do it!
i'll do my best!

name: asagi
normalized: if you are to carry out this mission, you will immediatelystart on a new training regimen.
you will learn everythingneeded to sneak in, even moreso than in the special camp.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes, ma'am!
i am recognized as a taimanin.
i can help yukikaze and rinko-ane.
finally, finally!

name: tatsurou
normalized: （yukikaze, i'm coming.
thinking of her, i clench my fist.
